verses.kjv: 16 Unto the woman he said, I will greatly multiply thy sorrow and thy conception; in sorrow thou shalt bring forth children; and thy desire shall be to thy husband, and he shall rule over thee.
verses.esv:
16 To the woman he said,

  “I will surely multiply your pain in childbearing;
    in pain you shall bring forth children.
  Your desire shall be contrary to your husband,
    but he shall rule over you.”
verses.niv: 16 To the woman he said, "I will greatly increase your pains in childbearing; with pain you will give birth to children. Your desire will be for your husband, and he will rule over you."

verses.kjv: 9 And here is the mind which hath wisdom. The seven heads are seven mountains, on which the woman sitteth.
verses.esv: 9 This calls for a mind with wisdom: the seven heads are seven mountains on which the woman is seated;
verses.niv: 9 "This calls for a mind with wisdom. The seven heads are seven hills on which the woman sits.

verses.kjv: 25 Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;
verses.esv: 25 Husbands, love your wives, as Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her,
verses.niv: 25 Husbands, love your wives, just as Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her

verses.kjv: 27 And he answering said, Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy strength, and with all thy mind; and thy neighbour as thyself.
verses.esv: 27 And he answered, “You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength and with all your mind, and your neighbor as yourself.”
verses.niv: 27 He answered: "'Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength and with all your mind'; and, 'Love your neighbor as yourself.'"

verses.kjv: 19 But Mary kept all these things, and pondered them in her heart.
verses.esv: 19 But Mary treasured up all these things, pondering them in her heart.
verses.niv: 19 But Mary treasured up all these things and pondered them in her heart.

verses.kjv: 8 But if any provide not for his own, and specially for those of his own house, he hath denied the faith, and is worse than an infidel.
verses.esv: 8 But if anyone does not provide for his relatives, and especially for members of his household, he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever.
verses.niv: 8 If anyone does not provide for his relatives, and especially for his immediate family, he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever.

verses.kjv: 21 Fathers, provoke not your children to anger, lest they be discouraged.
verses.esv: 21 Fathers, do not provoke your children, lest they become discouraged.
verses.niv: 21 Fathers, do not embitter your children, or they will become discouraged.

verses.kjv: 2 Fulfil ye my joy, that ye be likeminded, having the same love, being of one accord, of one mind.
verses.esv: 2 complete my joy by being of the same mind, having the same love, being in full accord and of one mind.
verses.niv: 2 then make my joy complete by being like-minded, having the same love, being one in spirit and purpose.

verses.kjv: 22 Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as unto the Lord.
verses.esv: 22 Wives, submit to your own husbands, as to the Lord.
verses.niv: 22 Wives, submit to your husbands as to the Lord.

verses.kjv: 22 And hath put all things under his feet, and gave him to be the head over all things to the church,
verses.esv: 22 And he put all things under his feet and gave him as head over all things to the church,
verses.niv: 22 And God placed all things under his feet and appointed him to be head over everything for the church,

verses.kjv: 3 But I fear, lest by any means, as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty, so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ.
verses.esv: 3 But I am afraid that as the serpent deceived Eve by his cunning, your thoughts will be led astray from a sincere and pure devotion to Christ.
verses.niv: 3 But I am afraid that just as Eve was deceived by the serpent's cunning, your minds may somehow be led astray from your sincere and pure devotion to Christ.

verses.kjv: 5 Casting down imaginations, and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God, and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ;
verses.esv: 5 We destroy arguments and every lofty opinion raised against the knowledge of God, and take every thought captive to obey Christ,
verses.niv: 5 We demolish arguments and every pretension that sets itself up against the knowledge of God, and we take captive every thought to make it obedient to Christ.

verses.kjv: 19 What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own? 20 For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God’s.
verses.esv: 19 Or do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit within you, whom you have from God? You are not your own, 20 for you were bought with a price. So glorify God in your body.
verses.niv: 19 Do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God? You are not your own; 20 you were bought at a price. Therefore honor God with your body.

verses.kjv: 10 Now I beseech you, brethren, by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that ye all speak the same thing, and that there be no divisions among you; but that ye be perfectly joined together in the same mind and in the same judgment.
verses.esv: 10 I appeal to you, brothers, by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that all of you agree, and that there be no divisions among you, but that you be united in the same mind and the same judgment.
verses.niv: 10 I appeal to you, brothers, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that all of you agree with one another so that there may be no divisions among you and that you may be perfectly united in mind and thought.

verses.kjv: 28 And even as they did not like to retain God in their knowledge, God gave them over to a reprobate mind, to do those things which are not convenient;
verses.esv: 28 And since they did not see fit to acknowledge God, God gave them up to a debased mind to do what ought not to be done.
verses.niv: 28 Furthermore, since they did not think it worthwhile to retain the knowledge of God, he gave them over to a depraved mind, to do what ought not to be done.

verses.kjv: 1 And when they were escaped, then they knew that the island was called Melita.
verses.esv: 28:1 After we were brought safely through, we then learned that the island was called Malta.
verses.niv: 1 Once safely on shore, we found out that the island was called Malta.

verses.kjv: 16 And now why tarriest thou? arise, and be baptized, and wash away thy sins, calling on the name of the Lord.
verses.esv: 16 And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’
verses.niv: 16 And now what are you waiting for? Get up, be baptized and wash your sins away, calling on his name.'

verses.kjv: 41 Then they that gladly received his word were baptized: and the same day there were added unto them about three thousand souls.
verses.esv: 41 So those who received his word were baptized, and there were added that day about three thousand souls.
verses.niv: 41 Those who accepted his message were baptized, and about three thousand were added to their number that day.

verses.kjv: 40 He hath blinded their eyes, and hardened their heart; that they should not see with their eyes, nor understand with their heart, and be converted, and I should heal them.
verses.esv:
40   “He has blinded their eyes
    and hardened their heart,
  lest they see with their eyes,
    and understand with their heart, and turn,
    and I would heal them.”
verses.niv: 40 "He has blinded their eyes and deadened their hearts, so they can neither see with their eyes, nor understand with their hearts, nor turn--and I would heal them."

verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.kjv: 38 And he said unto them, Why are ye troubled? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts?
verses.esv: 38 And he said to them, “Why are you troubled, and why do doubts arise in your hearts?
verses.niv: 38 He said to them, "Why are you troubled, and why do doubts rise in your minds?

verses.kjv: 47 And Jesus, perceiving the thought of their heart, took a child, and set him by him,
verses.esv: 47 But Jesus, knowing the reasoning of their hearts, took a child and put him by his side
verses.niv: 47 Jesus, knowing their thoughts, took a little child and had him stand beside him.

verses.kjv: 22 But when Jesus perceived their thoughts, he answering said unto them, What reason ye in your hearts?
verses.esv: 22 When Jesus perceived their thoughts, he answered them, “Why do you question in your hearts?
verses.niv: 22 Jesus knew what they were thinking and asked, "Why are you thinking these things in your hearts?

verses.kjv: 15 And he said unto them, Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature.
verses.esv: 15 And he said to them, “Go into all the world and proclaim the gospel to the whole creation.
verses.niv: 15 He said to them, "Go into all the world and preach the good news to all creation.

verses.kjv: 21 For from within, out of the heart of men, proceed evil thoughts, adulteries, fornications, murders,
verses.esv: 21 For from within, out of the heart of man, come evil thoughts, sexual immorality, theft, murder, adultery,
verses.niv: 21 For from within, out of men's hearts, come evil thoughts, sexual immorality, theft, murder, adultery,
